description:
The Legend of Zelda needs almost no introduction. Gather the eight fragments of the
Triforce of Wisdom, enter Death Mountain, defeat Ganon, and rescue Princess Zelda.
This randomizer shuffles all the items in the game around, leading to a new adventure
every time.

TLOZ-V2.description:
All the hard work was done by Rosalie-A. I'm just hosting the apworld so it is easier to link to and to have some notes about installation.
**PLEASE READ NOTES AT END! THIS ISN'T YOUR TYPICAL APWORLD INSTALL!**

New Features since v1:
- Migrated from a custom client to Bizhawk Client.
- Migrated to APProcedurePatch so rom is no longer needed for generation
- Added in new options for weapon and defense logic.
- Added in Entrance Randomization options.

Note: since this is an apworld for a currently supported AP game, you will need to backup your old tloz.apworld and replace it with this one. Also, with the transition to using Bizhawk Client, you will need to manually open aptloz patch files with Bizhawk Client, as Archipelago will still try to associate said patches with the old Zelda1 Client until this update is fully merged and released.
TLOZ-V2.title: TLOZ v2 APWorld
